title: Business and Racial Justice in America
itunes:title: Business and Racial Justice in America
description:
Edelman CEO Richard Edelman discusses the results of the communications firm's latest Trust Barometer entitled “Business and Racial Justice in America.” He says companies are being expected to fix problems that the government usually addresses.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.
